content: What 1999 film features a character named Tyler Durden, who creates an underground fight club as a form of male bonding and rebellion against societal norms?

I believe you’re referring to the 1999 film "Fight Club" directed by David Fincher. The movie is based on Chuck Palahniuk's novel of the same name and stars Edward Norton as the unnamed narrator and Brad Pitt as Tyler Durden. In the film, Tyler Durden indeed creates an underground fight club that serves as a platform for male bonding and rebellion against the conformist pressures of modern society.
